entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ILVerify throws NullRef exception in a couple tests #58652
  • Positional patterns on tuple inputs leads to confusion #58650
  • NullReferenceException in SyntaxInputNode.VisitTree #58647
  • Reinfer nullable annotation of 'var' variables #58645
    17.2
  • Compiler makes the wrong nullability assumption about unannotated code #58641
  • C#: erroneus CS8618 warning with partial class when definition is in one file and initialization in another #58640
    17.2
  • Syntax highlight breaks down for # right before an interpolated hole: $"#{foo}" #58637
  • Roslyn analyzer suggestion to convert a switch statement to switch expression alters runtime code behavior #58636
  • Incremental source generators do not recover from an exception #58625
    17.1

Closed

  • Intellisense changes existing, correct variable to capitalized option with same name (record class parameters) #57923
    17.1
  • Roslyn throws NRE after applying change on ASP.NET app #58651
  • NullReferenceException in AbstractRemoveUnusedValuesCodeFixProvider #58606
    17.2
  • VBCSCompilerServerTests+ShutdownTests.Standard is flaky #57837
    17.1
  • Expected warnings are not given for redundant subpatterns #58642
    17.2
  • Switch expression with 'object' receiver type inconsistently casts int to double #58634
  • VS 16.5.0 Preview 3.0 - IDE0071WithoutSuggestion #42096
    Backlog
  • IDE0059 False Positive with finally branch #42197
    Backlog
  • Intellisense, Syntax highlight and Error Window are badly broken with incremental source generator in Visual Studio 17.0.4 #58523
    17.1
  • InvalidOperationException: WaitAndGetResult cannot be called from a thread pool thread #58612
    17.1
  • Allow completion to add a global using rather than a file scoped using #58341
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove a first chance exception for normal cancellation #58646
    Area-IDE
  • Fix a few param-nullchecking parsing bugs #58644
    Area-Compilers
  • Verify correct additional location for reported diagnostic #58630
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, 17.1
  • Upgrade Microsoft.VisualStudio.Telemetry to 16.4.22 #58621
    Area-Infrastructure, Approved to merge, 17.1.P3
  • [LSP] Fix semantic tokens overlap bug #58620
    Area-IDE, Approved to merge, 17.1.P3

Merged

  • Fix null reference in SyntaxInputNode #58649
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators, 17.1
  • Move off deprecated Mac queue #58639
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Fix flaky compiler server test #58638
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #58648
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge 17.2 branch back to main #58631
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.1-vs-deps to main-vs-deps #58632
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Add truly synchronous indentation service interface for F# #57600
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #58643
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Call InitializeTelemetrySession on background thread #58399
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #58633
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to main #58626
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to release/dev17.1-vs-deps #58628
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.1-vs-deps to main-vs-deps #58627
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Snapping for 17.1 P3 #58624
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #58629
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Remove FileTextLoaderOptions #58596
    Area-IDE, 17.2
  • Merge main to release/dev17.1 #58622
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main-vs-deps to release/dev17.1-vs-deps #58623
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • SourceLink quality of life improvements #58209
    Area-IDE, 17.1.P3
  • Merge release/dev17.1-vs-deps to main-vs-deps #58618
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Make TryNavigateToMetadataSymbol asynchronous #58617
    Area-IDE, 17.1.P3
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #58601
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, 17.1.P3

Updated

  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #58655
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to release/dev17.1-vs-deps #58654
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to main #58653
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Correctly handle null array constants from source and metadata #58604
    Area-Compilers
  • Make IOperation.ChildOperations public #52923
    Area-Compilers
  • Support live diagnostics in source generated files #58363
    Area-IDE, UX Review Not Required
  • Do not synthesize a parameterless constructor for struct types; report error if struct has field initializers but no constructors #58581
    Area-Compilers
  • Simplify fault reporting #58367
    Area-IDE, Approved to merge, 17.1.P3
  • Add IL verification with ILVerify in addition to PEVerify #37994
    Area-Compilers, PR For Personal Review Only
  • Parameter null-checking analyzer and fixer #58182
    Area-Analyzers
  • IDE code generator service refactoring #58244
    Area-IDE, Needs UX Triage
  • Rename and share CompilerAnalyzerConfigOptions #58579
    Area-Analyzers
  • Avoid race condition in map for TupleElementIndex #58500
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Tuples
  • List patterns: Slice value is assumed to be never null #57457
    Area-Compilers, Community, New Feature - List Patterns
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 1536528 #58384
    auto-merge
  • Cache the delegate for static method group conversions. #58288
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Remove BackgroundParser and BackgroundCompiler #58453
    Area-IDE
  • Synthesize delegate types for lambdas with parameter types or return type that are not valid type arguments #57295
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Lambda Improvements
  • Merge features/snappy/nodelay to main-vs-deps #55078
    Area-Infrastructure, UX Review Not Required
  • Format list patterns #57568
    Area-IDE
  • Add external access to stacktrace APIs for Unit Testing #58082
    Area-IDE
  • Remove OptionSet and Workspace from TypeScript and F# Inline Rename interfaces #58381
    Area-IDE
